Package Controller

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.LoginController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller class that provides the control logic for the Login screen.
    Author:
    Jonathan Waters

      • cancelButtonAction

        void cancelButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Closes and terminates the application.
        Parameters:

      • loginButtonAction

        void loginButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       java.sql.SQLException
        Calls validUser() and openAppointmentsScreen() if user is valid. Calls Userlog.writeLog() to update user log with login attempt details. Calls appointmentReminder() to display reminder message.
        Parameters:
        event - Login button action.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - From openAppointmentsScreen().
        java.sql.SQLException - From appointmentReminder().

        Parameters:

        resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if

      • appointmentReminder

        private void appointmentReminder()
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
